overview: Barbie is now the star of a brand-new video!  Barbie leads nine girls in over a dozen hot new dance workout routines--fun steps like the Barbie Basic, Hot Foot, Sidewalk Strut, Jammin' Jogger, Broadway Barbie...and more!  Every girl will love Barbie's newest and most exciting video ever...  DANCE!  WORKOUT WITH BARBIE!
title: Dance! Workout with Barbie
